imageAlt: Person with oil in their left hand
title: Aromatherapy massage
description: These massages combine gentle pressure with essential oils

title: Deep tissue massage
description: A massage therapist will use slow strokes and deep finger pressure to relieve tension from the deepest layers of tissue and muscles

imageAlt: Hot stones on a person's back
title: Hot stone massage
description: Place hot stones on different areas on your body

imageAlt: Someone getting a massage and smiling
title: Swedish massage
description: The Swedish massage is performed to energize the body and improve overall health. This type of massage involves actions like percussion, kneading, vibration, tapping and rolling.

title: Sports massage
description: Whether you are an elite athlete, a weekend warrior, or someone embracing a new fitness journey, sports massage at Therapeutic Streams provides the tailored care your muscles crave.

imageAlt: Woman doing a trigger point massage
title: Trigger point massage
description: Trigger points occur in the trapezius muscle. This is a very large back muscle that extends from below your shoulder blades, up to your shoulders, and then along the back of your neck.

title: Reflexology
description: Reflexology significantly decreased the anxiety of patients undergoing cardiovascular procedures compared with the control group

title: Shiatsu massage
description: While shiatsu translates as finger pressure, a shiatsu therapist may also use palms, elbows, and sometimes feet to apply pressure along energy lines or paths to relieve pain and tension in the body

title: Thai massage
description: Lie fully clothed on a mat on the ground while a practitioner uses stretching, pulling, and rocking techniques to relieve tension, promote relaxation, and improve flexibility and circulation

title: Chair massage
description: This massage focuses on quick massages that focuses on the back, shoulders, and the neck. Chair massage also helps relieve stress and promote relaxation.

title: Lymphatic drainage massage
description: Lymphatic drainage massage, is a specialized type of medical massage. It can help treat lymphedema, in which lymphatic fluid collects in certain areas of the body because it cannot drain away effectively.

imageAlt: A person massaging their left shoulder
title: Abhyanga massage
description: A type of oil massage that is warmed and gently massaged over the entire body. This massage focuses on nourishing the skin.
